Sports Internships

On Wednesday from  p.m PERIOD at the Toppel Career Center Library Toppel experts will present sports internship opportunities PERIOD The session will help address concerns such as finding an internship choosing the right type of sports internship and working for a local Miami team or one in your hometown PERIOD For more information contact Frits Bigham at fbighammiami.edu PERIOD

Food Day

The Office of Civic and Community Engagement will celebrate the nationwide event Food Day on Wednesday PERIOD Food Day promotes the movement for healthy affordable and sustainable food. the Well Canes Farmers Market will be held on the Green from  a.m PERIOD to  p.m PERIOD Then a Community Food Organization Fair that includes nonprofits and campus groups will be held in the UC lower lounge from  a.m PERIOD to  p.m PERIOD Food Day then ends with a film screening and panel discussion at the Wesley College of Arts  Sciences Gallery from  to  p.m PERIOD For more information visit miami.educivic PERIOD

Alexander Gonzalez may be contacted at agonzalezthemiamihurricane.com PERIOD















The Miami Hurricane is the student newspaper of the University of Miami in Coral Gables Florida PERIOD The newspaper is edited and produced by undergraduate students at UM and is published in print every Tuesday and online everyday during the academic year PERIOD
